question.title: Set log levels per class with AWS Managed Apache Flink
question.body:
This question is specific to AWS Managed Flink (1.19). I know how to control logging in most Java apps, but everything I know is failing in this case.

I have a Java application running in Amazon Managed Service for Apache Flink (MSF).
MSF uses log4j2, and they allow you configure the global log level,
but I don't see a way to set the log level on individual classes and packages.
I have tried providing my own log4j2.xml but it appears to be ignored.
The same with setting various environment variables.
All I really want is for 3rd party code to log at WARN
but still have my code log at DEBUG.
I can't find any docs for this, but I hope if someone can provide
exactly the right flag or env var that I can control it.
